elements.name: Verify products are arranged in Alphabetical order on Computers page

steps.name: I select "Name: Z to A" from Sort By dropdown
I verify Products are displayed in Descending order

name: Computer Test
description:
As a user I should able to arrange products in Alphabetical order in Computer page
and can add product to shopping cart successfully

elements.name: Verify navigate to Cell Phone successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover on "Cell phone" phone and click

elements.name: : Verify product added successfully and place order successfully

steps.name: I mouse hover on "Cell phone" and click
I verify text nokia lumia "Nokia Lumia 1020"
I click on add to cart tab
I verify shopping cart message "The product has been added to your shopping cart"

arguments.val: The product has been added to your shopping cart

steps.name: I mouse hover on shopping cart
I click on go to cart
I verify shopping cart title "Shopping cart"
I click on terms of service checkbox
I verify register text message "Your registration completed"
I verify Shopping Cart title "Shopping cart"

name: Electronics Test
description:
As a user I should able to navigate to Cell Phone page successfully
and can verify that product added successfully and place the order successfully

elements.name: User should navigate to all top menu page

steps.name: I click on "Computers" from Top Menu
I navigate to relevant page successfully

steps.name: I click on "Electronics" from Top Menu
I navigate to relevant page successfully
